sentences.cn: 布赖恩的犹豫几乎难以察觉。

sentences.en: Color is imperceptible to the touch.
From where he sat he made an imperceptible sign to the tavern - keeper.
sentences.cn: 这时他从他座上向那酒店老板使了个眼色.

sentences.en: He gave an almost imperceptible nod.
sentences.cn: 他略一点头,别人几乎无法察觉.

sentences.en: He gave me an almost imperceptible nod.
His head moved in an almost imperceptible nod.
sentences.cn: 他点头的动作微小得几乎看不出来.

sentences.en: Its own elliptic motion around it will be almost imperceptible.
sentences.cn: 它绕着质心的椭园运动就几乎看不出来.

sentences.en: She answered with an almost imperceptible nod of the head.
sentences.cn: 她几乎不为人察觉地点了一下头作为回答.

sentences.en: Such changes are imperceptible to even the best-trained eye.
sentences.cn: 这样的变化即使是对最训练有素的人来说也不易察觉。

sentences.en: The cost was imperceptible at first.
sentences.cn: 这种损耗在开始时觉察不到.

sentences.en: The difference is imperceptible to me.
The film was edited by a skilled technician so that the joints are imperceptible.
sentences.cn: 这部影片是由一位技术熟练的技术人员剪辑的,因此连接处难以觉察.

sentences.en: The slight change in the taste was imperceptible to most people.
sentences.cn: 这种味道的细微变化对大多数人而言是无法觉察的.
这种过渡几乎觉察不到.

words.tran_cn: 极微地；微细地；察觉不到地
细微；目所不见；无法感知

trans.tran_cn: 感觉不到的，无法察觉的
trans.tran_en: almost impossible to see or notice
